Lab2Class Bruschetta Bruschetta Show Recipe Bruschetta Recipe Ingredients 4 plum tomatoes 
6 basil leaves 
3 garlic cloves, chopped 
3 TB olive oil Directions Combine the ingredients and add salt to taste. Top French bread slices with mixture Back Bruschetta Recipie> Ingredients> 4 Plum Tomatoes> 6 basil leaves Directions Combin the ingredients and add salt to taste.Top French bread slices with mixture
